oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Foster Avenue Church of Christ, 2001 December
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: A photograph of the Foster Avenue Church of Christ located at 2614 Foster Avenue in Nashville, Tennessee. The foundation is stone and concrete. The exterior walls are red brick. The roof is gabled and comprised of tar shingles. The windows are frosted glass. Some windows were originally arched, but now have been filled in with brick. Back doors are metal while the front doors are wooden with two small windows. Forms part of the Historic Nashville, Inc. Sacred Sites Survey Project. 1 photograph : col. ; 4 x 6 in.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Foster Avenue Church of Christ (Nashville, Tenn.)
